name: Love Garden Rivalry
description:
EDIT: Found an updated version on my hdd, only a year late. This version has a better map but doesn't work correctly in Firefox.

2 Player game. Work in Progress.

Quick mockup for both

#fathersdayjam and #ilujam

Controls

Use either gamepads or

arrow keys and AWSD to control players.

Aim of game

Win your partners love by bringing them flowers from the garden.

(No partners yet, still working on that :)

Inspired by Girl's Garden by SEGA. Play online here - Flash
